text: Afrosataspes is a genus of moths. It is in the family of Sphingidae. It has only one species, Afrosataspes galleyi. It is from the Central African Republic and the Democratic Republic of the Congo. It is a mimic of the Xylocopa carpenter bees. The adults are black and the antennae are short. == References == Category:Smerinthini
title: Afrosataspes
